doc:
Ford Sterling https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ford_Sterling 0 Ford Sterling (born George Ford Stich Jr., November 3, 1883 – October 13, 1939) was an American comedian and actor best known for his work with Keystone Studios. One of the 'Big 4', he was the original chief of the Keystone Cops. Ford_Sterling ( born George_Ford_Stich_Jr. , November_3_,_1883 – October_13_,_1939 ) was an_American_comedian_and_actor best_known for his_work with Keystone_Studios . One of the_'_Big_4_' , he was the_original_chief of the_Keystone_Cops .
